trans-unit.source: After you define the content for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object, you must add it to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver definito il contenuto per un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> dell'oggetto, è necessario aggiungerlo al <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> raccolta di un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> istanza utilizzando il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> cannot be used for recognition until it has been added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> collection of an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> non può essere utilizzato per il riconoscimento fino a quando non è stato aggiunto il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> raccolta di un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The array of rule objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: La matrice di oggetti regola da aggiungere all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the contents of an array of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> objects to the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge il contenuto di una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Any <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> object in the <paramref name="rules" /> array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> nella matrice <paramref name="rules" /> è <see langword="null" />.
